Upgrades.query:
query Upgrades($tokenIds: [Int!]!) {
  upgraded_stats(where: {token_id: {_in: $tokenIds}}, order_by: [ {token_id: asc}, {upgrade_id: asc} ]) {
    token_id 
 upgrade {
      id
      name
      short_name
      price
      type
      __typename
    }
    max_capacity
    max_range
    max_speed
    fuel_efficiency
    emission_rate
    owned
    applied
    __typename
  }
}
